Articles.Content: I teleport the nuke into the sun right before it exploded, along with the next poster.

Yeah, sundive!!!

I use Duct Tape to make an invincible shield around myself, while the nuke explodes and propels me and my shield at the next poster.

I think i get hit, but then i teleport inside Starwhip and we fuse.

I then lunch the next poster in the face.
I build a high tech mech out of duct tape to deflect the merged guys in a duct tape shield and My next victim is the next poster.

Duct tape mech, that's punny...

Let's see how do you manage to survive my mech!

(Image for those who are unfamiliar with Warhammer 40k)

I titanfall-style hijack you.

The next user has the mech falling ontop of it.

Fortunately, larger things are always proportionality more fragile then smaller things, so a mech that size would not be able to exist in the first place without collapsing under it's own weight. PHYSICS FTW! Then again, that giant mech was made by a Kraken...

I teleport the mech into the sun with the next poster inside of it. MUAHAHAHAHAAAAAA!

Before the mech hits the sun, I go into the matrix and teleport using satellites, back to earth.

The next poster is stuck with me in the matrix, and they are slowly being infected with a virus.
I am immune to that virus, but the next poster is not... I infect the next poster with the virus.

I invent a cure and cure myself. Unfortunately this cure makes you insane.

I throw the cure on the next poster.
I am already insane, so it has no effect on me. I hire an army of ninjas and snipers to kill the next poster.

They can not kill what is not there.

I use duct tape to tape the next poster's mouth and nose shut.

I grab a switchblade and cut the tape off.

I throw stable stranglet matter onto the floor, thus starting the conversion of the ENTIRE PLANET EARTH into strange matter, including the next poster's body.

What if I got a little help from Cave Johnson?

I send the next poster on the moon with a portal gun.
I steal an Apollo lunar lander that I found. The next poster was the original owner of that lander and is now stranded on the moon.
Jeb comes to my rescue, but forgot the parachutes. On the way back down to earth, the next poster is plummeting at 1100m/s with no parachutes or engines.

Wingsuits, my friend.

However, I need SOMEWHERE to land, and I choose the next poster as my "cushion".
I bring in Jebs helmet, and you spring to the next poster, while the helmet is krakenized.

Throw the cheese!

It destroys the wingsuit and you plummet to your death.

And then I say, "I like TRAINS," and the next poster gets run over by said train.
I do the flop just in time to save myself. The next poster does the flop while standing at the edge of the roof of a tall building.
My power is over 9000! I survive and go super saiyan on the next poster
I have no idea what that is, but I am sure nuking you from orbit would improve my situation. The next poster was on the nuke I used on spaceman1999.
Thankfully, I was wearing a bomb suit, and the nuke was only a few centimeteres big. I make the world think that the next person is Hitler, and everybody goes to bomb him.
I fake committing suicide to get everyone off my back. The next poster gets trapped in one of my sane asylums.

I for some reason escaped and blew up the asylum.

One wall of the asylum crashes to the next poster.
